price: Àwa kò dá sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ àti ohun tí ń bẹ láààrin àwọn méjèèjì pẹ̀lú eré ṣíṣe.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāa wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
